reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 30, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A comprehensive First Aid Kit for work, home, camping, or in one’s vehicle for emergencies …
reviews.reviewText: If you’re looking for a full First Aid Kit, complete with everything from a tourniquet to a surgical kit, take a pass. This First Aid Kit isn’t meant to be a full kit, but rather one that can be used at home or at work. There’s a small pocket guide to First Aid, which is essentially a folded piece of paper with the basics. I’ve taken a Red Cross first aid training course, but if I don’t have a kit like this, I’m very limited as to what I can do. I am, however, very impressed with how well put together this kit actually is.I have a molle bag setup with critical emergency supplies, supplies a paramedic could actually make use of. This bag is a high-quality, solid one, that holds a lot. The zippers are synthetic and glide easily. No need to treat them with graphite. The double zippers are metal and easy to grab, especially with the zipper pulls. There’s piping around the edges of the kit to ensure it won’t fall apart. The bag has different carry options and can be attached to a belt or clipped to a backpack.With a full 130 pieces, it’s got a bit of everything one might need. I was impressed with the variety, including the fact there’s an emergency blankets and small vial of saline included. If you have any specialized medical needs, there is some duplication. Some items can be removed and others can be put in their place. Very nice First Aid Kit that’s definitely worth the asking price of around $16. It’s a bargain actually!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of first aid supplies packed into easy to see RED case.
reviews.reviewText: The First Aid Case covers the first important element for this type of product. The red color, with white piping and lettering makes it very easy to find and identify. In an emergency, you want to be able to locate the first aid kit asap.The case is literally stuffed with various supplies. They cover the basics, with some additional goodies. Besides the usual complement of bandages and gauze pads, they supply an analog compass, scissors, tweezers, safety pins and carabiner. While they do not include an antiseptic, they do include saline solution which can be used to wash out a scrape or cut. I'm also impressed that they include a cold compress product and an emergency thermal (mylar) blanket. This blanket is handy, especially to assist someone that might be in shock.The addition of the analog compass enhances the worth of this kit for camping or hiking. But, the relatively compact form makes this ideal to keep in the car, or to take along on a cookout/picnic or outdoor outing. I would include a few more 'essential' first aid supplies, to deal with burns and antiseptic application. However, the product details does provide a very clear, detailed listing of the contents. The product is exactly as described and shown in the product details.Based on very favorable initial impressions, this First Aid Kit earns a 4.75 - 5 star rating, with a very high level recommendation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great, compact first aid kit
reviews.reviewText: This first aid kit is compact and yet pretty comprehensive. It has a great assortment of essential emergency supplies such as bandages, gauze pads, first aid tools and some survival tools as well. Notably, these also include saline solution, instant cold pack, emergency blanket, CPR mask, tourniquet and compress. The supplies and tools are of good quality and serviceable. You can add an antibiotic ointment and some pain killers to complete the kit.This kit comes in a compact and well-made double zipper soft case. It is about 6.75" x 5 x 2.5" in size, highly portable and has both a belt loop and a plastic clip for easy carrying. The belt loop is detachable on one end with a snap button for closure. There is also a reflective strip on the front for personal safety in low-light conditions.Overall, this is a great first aid kit. Compact, pretty full and highly portable. It is great to have in the car, hiking, boating, camping, etc. Also handy in home and office. Mine has an manufacture date of just 2 months ago and a 5-year shelf life. Made in China. It is pretty well priced. A good value for the money. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great items but case could be much better.
reviews.reviewText: Great items, but wish the zipper opened more for easier access. I can also see the thin plastic that holds all the materials ripping easily after minimal use. I would recommend this kit for a basement “panic/storm room” scenario where it just sits next to a weather radio and hopefully never gets used. I would recommend something in a better case (thicker, better zippers, something that opens flat for easier access, doesn’t have cheap plastic holding materials in) for putting in your vehicle, travel bag, or anywhere else it would actually get used and will hold up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So useful and needed
reviews.reviewText: I believe it comes with pretty much everything you need plus some. From safety pins (varying in sizes) to cotton swabs to a compass. There's even a face shield to use if you're performing CPR and need to give rescue breaths. Every item in this kit is useful and practical for any emergency or situation you may have. I'll need to get one more to have on my car because you can never be too prepared. Some things I may never use like the emergency blanket and carabiner, but I'd rather have it and not need it than need it and not have it. The bandages have good adhesive to them and the tweezers are perfect for use with getting out splinters. The pouch is very waterproof as I've tested it out and had no water entering the inside of it. Very good resource to have and worth the price. Definitely recommend having in your home or while you're out and about.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice compact and affordable first aid kit with good variety of basic needs and sturdy bag
reviews.reviewText: This review is for: 130 Pieces First Aid Kit with Hospital Grade Medical Supplies - Includes Emergency Blanket, Bandage - Great for Home, Outdoors, Office, Car, Travel, Camping, Hiking, BoatingThis first aid kit is actually a decent compact size that doesn’t take up too much space. The bag itself is thick and sturdy and the zippers are good and smooth - so they close and zip open easily.- the bag has a reflective strip in case it’s needed to guide traffic on a small scale.The contents of the first aid kit is basically almost everything you would need in the most basic sense. I found this bag and kit contents to be quite comparable to other pieces I would put together for a camping trip plus more.For under $17, this is certainly an affordable kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a really great kit, it's small and compact but there is so much in it. Fantastic kit at a fantastic price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Smashing first aid kit which we are using in the car - good selection of kit

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great compact little kit that has everything you need in it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The first aid kit in my flat has been a good addition. Being someone of ill health it a way to relax knowing if I in a household accident I got a kit I can go to or a kit light in weight that my support dog can bring to me. The kit comes with extras I did not think about but am thankful they in first aid kit like pins, whistle, compass, different size plasters, bandages and lint dressings as well as antiseptic wipes - these are the greatest finds in the first aid kit. I have had a few accidents with my joint pain and have used these with great ease and I am very grateful of finding this on Amazon. Great job great find very happy to buy again when I need to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Good value , The case could do to be bigger
